original_text: I thought about all the hard work that I have done here on the earth. When I die, all the things that I worked so hard to get will belong to the next king. So I hated all my hard work. I thought about all the hard work that I have done here on the earth. When I die, all the things that I worked so hard to get will belong to the next king. So I hated all my hard work.
korean_text: 내가 해 아래에서 내가 한 모든 수고를 미워하였노니 이는 내 뒤를 이을 이에게 남겨 주게 됨이라
